rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room with natural lighting and open space for social gatherings.
Chef friendly kitchen with modern amenities designed to complement the Bohemian aesthetic.
Open dining area integrated with the living room for seamless flow and conversation.
Master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Guest bedroom with natural light and access to courtyard views.
Third bedroom designed for flexibility or as a study area.
Compact servant quarters located in the rear part of the property with essential amenities.
Cozy library integrated into living space with shelves and seating area.

openings.description: Main entrance door offering secure access to the townhouse.
Secondary exit for easy access to the courtyard and servant's quarters.
Window openings overlooking the central courtyard ensuring natural light.

vastu_considerations.details: Main entrance should be in the east or north to align with positive energy flow as per Vastu Shastra.
Central courtyard ensures proper ventilation and natural lighting, aligning with Vastu principles for health and prosperity.
